EmailTemplate.name: DPS - Web Search
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Protection Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont products. I am unaware of a company that manufactures a product that you are looking for. You may want to conduct a search on the web.
Please visit out DuPont website which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Directories/en_US/Products_Services_Index/index.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
